text:
Foodora (foodora.com) - Berlin, Germany - ONSITE

foodora is a Berlin-based food delivery service that partners exclusively with beloved local restaurants to deliver quality meals in over 50 cities worldwide. We know the best that our cities offer and weâ€™re bringing it online, enabling our customers to order their favorite food through our app (for iOS or Android) or web portal. We provide our restaurant-partners with an on-demand fleet of bicycle couriers, making it simple for customers around the world to access delicious meals.

We are currently looking for the following roles to join our team in Berlin:

Senior Systems Engineer (m/f): http://grnh.se/gs6kl71

Senior Ruby Engineer (m/f): http://grnh.se/uio3jb1

Android Engineer (m/f): http://grnh.se/0ye6co1

Data Scientist - Forecasting (m/f): http://grnh.se/17fvdj1

Please note, we are unable to assist with visa or relocation support for these roles.

If you have any questions, let me know: jobs@foodora.de.
